idea: Drowning is serious and neglected public health threat and there are no broad prevention efforts that target drowning. We at GoFloat have come up with a solution which will help people to overcome this threat. GoFloat has developed a floatation & tracking device which is comfortable and easy to use. GoFloat is based in Mumbai, India
name: GOFLOAT TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ZAPAPP is an Indian company which is expert in understanding the pains faced by a human being and suggesting with a robust solution via Application. The management team is a perfect blend of technical and commercial consultants. The national and international experience of the team ensures for the smooth day to day functionality in each process.

‘YETAV’ App is one of the flagship products of ZAPAPP SOLUTIONS PVT LTD. Yetav is a trusted social carpooling app that helps passengers and vehicle owners to connect with each other. Yeatv is a Green Initiative to reduce fuel consumption by traveling together which will ultimately lead to saving the environment. Yetav also promotes women safety. It uses a real-time matching process to help match people going in the same direction. Some of these users will be Vehicle Owners (Auto owner, Car Owner or Bike owner) can give ride to other people to share the cost and some of these users will come together by making a group and they can hire a vehicle on their own to share the cost.
name: ZAPAPP SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Through Eazo's mobility platform, now tracking the delivery for a consumer is made easier than before. name: EAZO LOGISTICS TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
